Title: Helter Skelter
Genre: Biography, Crime, Drama, History, Horror, Thriller
Writer: Vincent Bugliosi (book), Curt Gentry (book), John Gray
Actors: Jeremy Davies, Clea DuVall, Allison Smith, Eric Dane
Plot: A new take on the Manson Family murders, with a keen focus on Charles Manson himself.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 5 nominations.
